message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,000. I believe it's a great deal for both of us, considering its value to you. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope this revised offer meets your needs.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm not able to go that low just yet.  How about $16,000? It's a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but I am still only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
